    • 方法详细资料

      • findUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/find",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<List<SysUser>> findUser(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 String name,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 String loginId,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 Integer status,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 Integer pi,
                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                 Integer ps)

      • getUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/get/{userId}",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<SysUser> getUser(@PathVariable
                                                          Integer userId)

      • updateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/update",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<Boolean> updateUser(SysUser user)

      • createUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/create",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public HttpJsonResult<SysUser> createUser(SysUser user)
